languages.text: Мудрые Адептус Механикус обратились с молебенным запросом к священным машинам геологического наблюдения, однако затем погрузились в изнурительный спор о том, можно ли открывать мирянам благословенные ритмы сейсмической активности. Спор этот не знал конца и затягивал завершение операции.

traits.locale_text: Мудрые Адептус Механикус обратились с молебенным запросом к священным машинам геологического наблюдения, однако затем погрузились в изнурительный спор о том, можно ли открывать мирянам благословенные ритмы сейсмической активности. Спор этот не знал конца и затягивал завершение операции.

languages.text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries, but then they fell into a gruelling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.
languages.original_text: Мудрые Адептус Механикус обратились с молебенным запросом к священным машинам геологического наблюдения, однако затем погрузились в изнурительный спор о том, можно ли открывать мирянам благословенные ритмы сейсмической активности. Спор этот не знал конца и затягивал завершение операции.

traits.locale_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful inquiries, but then they fell into a grueling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful inquiries, but then they fell into a grueling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful inquiries, but then they fell into a grueling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful inquiries, but then they fell into a gruelling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

languages.text: 帝国技術局の賢人が地質モニタリングを行う聖機械に祈りを捧げて問いかけたが、地震活動の聖なる律動を俗人に明らかにしても良いものかという大変な議論を巻き起こした。終わらない議論のせいで作戦決定が遅れることとなった。
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries, but then they fell into a gruelling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

traits.locale_text: 帝国技術局の賢人が地質モニタリングを行う聖機械に祈りを捧げて問いかけたが、地震活動の聖なる律動を俗人に明らかにしても良いものかという大変な議論を巻き起こした。終わらない議論のせいで作戦決定が遅れることとなった。

languages.text: 机械修会的智者们向神圣的地质监测机器发出了祈求，但随后又陷入了一场激烈的争论，争论的焦点在于能否向教外人士透露地震活动的相关情报。这群神甫争论不休，导致军事行动也受到了延误。
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries, but then they fell into a gruelling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

traits.locale_text: 机械修会的智者们向神圣的地质监测机器发出了祈求，但随后又陷入了一场激烈的争论，争论的焦点在于能否向教外人士透露地震活动的相关情报。这群祭司争论不休，导致军事行动也受到了延误。

languages.text: Los sabios del Adeptus Mechanicus apelaron a las sagradas máquinas de monitorización geológica con sus inquisitivas plegarias, pero entonces se enfrascaron en un agotador debate sobre si les estaba permitido revelar las benditas cadencias de la actividad sísmica a los seglares. El debate se prolongó infructuosamente y retrasó la conclusión de la operación.
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries, but then they fell into a gruelling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

traits.locale_text: Los sabios del Adeptus Mechanicus apelaron a las sagradas máquinas de monitorización geológica con sus inquisitivas plegarias, pero entonces se enfrascaron en un agotador debate sobre si les estaba permitido revelar las benditas cadencias de la actividad sísmica a los seglares. El debate se prolongó infructuosamente y retrasó la conclusión de la operación.

languages.text: Die Weisen des Adeptus Mechanicus wendeten sich betend an die heiligen Maschinen der geologischen Beobachtung, doch dann kam es zu einer zermürbenden Debatte darüber, ob es erlaubt sei, die gesegneten Rhythmen seismischer Aktivität an Laien weiterzugeben. Die Diskussion nahm kein Ende und verzögerte den Abschluss der Operation.
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries, but then they fell into a gruelling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

traits.locale_text: Die Weisen des Adeptus Mechanicus wendeten sich betend an die heiligen Maschinen der geologischen Beobachtung, doch dann kam es zu einer zermürbenden Debatte darüber, ob es erlaubt sei, die gesegneten Rhythmen seismischer Aktivität an Laien weiterzugeben. Die Diskussion nahm kein Ende und verzögerte den Abschluss der Operation.

languages.text: Les sages de l'Adeptus Mechanicus interrogèrent les machines sacrées responsables de la surveillance géologique, mais se demandèrent ensuite s'il était permis de dévoiler aux non-initiés les rythmes bénis de l'activité sismique. Ce débat interminable finit par retarder la conclusion de l'opération.
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries, but then they fell into a gruelling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.

traits.locale_text: Les sages de l'Adeptus Mechanicus interrogèrent les machines sacrées responsables de la surveillance géologique, mais se demandèrent ensuite s'il était permis de dévoiler aux non-initiés les rythmes bénis de l'activité sismique. Ce débat interminable finit par retarder la conclusion de l'opération.

languages.text: Adeptus Mechanicus'un bilgeleri, dualar eşliğinde sorularını kutsal jeolojik izleme makinelerine iletti. Akabinde kutsal sismik aktivitelerin ritimlerini avama açıklamanın uygun olup olmadığı konusunda hararetli bir münakaşa yaptılar. Bu tartışma bitmek bilmeyip operasyonun neticelenmesini geciktirdi.
languages.original_text: The wise ones of the Adeptus Mechanicus appealed to the sacred machines of geological monitoring with prayerful enquiries, but then they fell into a gruelling debate about whether it was permissible to reveal the blessed rhythms of seismic activity to laypersons. The debate was never-ending and delayed the conclusion of the operation.
